content: hot water bottle cover a simple and cozy cover for your hot water bottle worked either in the round or flat from the bottom up it is fast to knit up no matter your skill level yarn wren & ollie spin dk 230m/115g or any 8ply/dk yarn quantity 1 skein or approximately 170-200m needles flat version 4mm and 3 50mm straight needles in the round - 4mm and 3 50mm 80cm circular needles gauge 22 stitches and 30 row to 10cm in stocking stitch materials yarn needle for sewing up pom pom maker optional abbreviations p2togtbl purl two together through the back loop insert sts stitches the right needle into the second and first stitches from k knit the back going left to right purl them both together p purl kfb knit front and back techniques k2tog knit two together - judy s magic cast on for working in the round ssk slip slip knit - magic loop if working in the round p2tog purl two together insert right needle into the - mattress stitch first and second stitches from right to left purl - to use fold hot water bottle in half and place inside them both together cover before filling 1 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2019 pattern flat pattern in the round using 4mm needles and judy s magic cast on cast on 34 with 4mm needles cast on 36 sts sts on each needle 68 sts total row 1 ws purl to end round 1 knit to end row 2 rs k1 kfb k to last 3 sts kfb k2 two stitches round 2 kfb k to last 2 sts kfb k1 repeat on second increased needle 4 stitches increased repeat these two row 4 more times 46 stitches repeat these two rounds 4 more times or until 44 stitches work row 1 one more time on each needle 88 sts total sides sides row 1 rs knit to end knit all stitches until piece measures 26cm from cast on row 2 ws purl to end repeat these two row until piece measures 26cm from cast on top shaping round 1 k1 k2tog k to last 3 sts ssk k1 repeat on top shaping second needle 4 sts decreased repeat this round 11 more times or until 20 sts remain row 1 rs k2 k2tog k to last 4 sts ssk k2 40 sts total row 2 ws p2 p2togtbl p to last 4 sts p2tog p2 repeat these two row 5 more times or until 22 sts remain cuff change to smaller needles cuff round 1 k1 p2 k2 repeat to last 3 sts p2 k1 repeat until ribbing measures 11-12cm change to smaller needles row 1 rs k2 p2 k2 repeat to end bind off in pattern by binding off as usual but knit the row 2 ws p2 k2 p2 repeat to end knits and purl the purls as they appear repeat these two row until ribbing measures 11-12cm bind off
